Post:
"The voice in my head telling me to kill myself is because I'm inherently flawed and unworthy of living."

It's important to note that this type of attribution can be harmful and reinforce negative self-talk and stigma surrounding mental health. It's essential to recognize that mental health struggles are not a personal failing, but rather a sign that something in the person's environment or brain chemistry is not working correctly. It's important to seek help and support when struggling with mental health issues, rather than resorting to negative self-talk or harmful behaviors.

I will seek help and support when struggling with mental health issues, rather than resorting to negative self-talk or harmful behaviors."
